H0.text: It is a result of asexual reproduction is the correct statement concerning a 13‑year‑old boy who has blue eyes.

H1.text: It is a result of childhood nutrition is the correct statement concerning a 13‑year‑old boy who has blue eyes.

H2.text: It is an inherited characteristic is the correct statement concerning the eye color of a 13‑year‑old boy who has blue eyes.

H3.text: It is a personal choice concerning the eye color of a 13‑year‑old boy who has blue eyes.

A4.text: Eye color is an inherited trait determined by multiple genes.
